messages.content:
1.  The first cases of the novel coronavirus were reported in the Wuhan City, Hubei Province, China in December 2019.
2.  The disease was named as COVID-19 by the World Health Organization (WHO) on February 11, 2020.
3.  On a global scale, the number of confirmed cases were reported above 1 million on July 31, 2020.
4.  The number of affected countries above 100 on July 31, 2020.
5.  More than 4,600 people have died of COVID-19 as of August 2022.
Number of total people died with Covid
More than 4,600 people have died of COVID-19
tell me 5 things about the shape of square
It is round, rectangular, octagon, etc.
